CustomField.description: Different ways in which Members can be enrolled in a Challenge. Subscription Mode may be: Closed - Members are manually subscribed to a Challenge, Open - Members can subscribe themselves and Global - Members are automatically subscribed to an active Challenge when they perform an Action evaluated by a Mission.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose how Members can subscribe to the Challenge. When "Closed", you must manually subscribe Members. When "Open", Members can subscribe themselves. When "Global", Members are automatically subscribed upon performing a Mission Action.
CustomField.label: Subscription Mode
